@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:ServiceA").log("ServiceA has been called").delay(simple("${random(1000,2000)}")).to("direct:ServiceB").     from("direct:ServiceB").log("ServiceB has been called").delay(simple("${random(0,500)}")). }

@Override protected RoutesBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:ServiceA").log("ServiceA has been called").delay(simple("${random(1000,2000)}")).to("direct:ServiceB").             from("direct:ServiceB").log("ServiceB has been called").delay(simple("${random(0,500)}")).         }     }. }
